options.content:
# Solana Monitoring Dashboard
*check out our [github repo](https://github.com/AiNodes-Tech/solana-monitoring) if you want to start pushing metrics.

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: Disk Space Used

targets.query: select mean(used) as used from "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(total) as total from "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_indatagrams), 1s) as "in datagrams" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_outdatagrams), 1s) as "out datagrams" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

targets.legendFormat: NoPorts - UDP Datagrams received on a port with no listener
NoPorts - UDP Datagrams received on a port with no listener
InErrors - UDP Datagrams that could not be delivered to an application
InSegs - Segments received, including those received in error. This count includes segments received on currently established connections
targets.query: select mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED from "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

targets.legendFormat: OutSegs - Segments sent, including those on current connections but excluding those containing only retransmitted octets
targets.query: select mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT from "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

targets.legendFormat: ListenOverflows - Times the listen queue of a socket overflowed
ListenDrops - SYNs to LISTEN sockets ignored
TCPSynRetrans - SYN-SYN/ACK retransmits to break down retransmissions in SYN, fast/timeout retransmits
RetransSegs - Segments retransmitted - that is, the number of TCP segments transmitted containing one or more previously transmitted octets
InErrs - Segments received in error (e.g., bad TCP checksums)
OutRsts - Segments sent with RST flag
Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete
targets.query: select mean(running) as running from "processes" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
select mean(blocked) as blocked from "processes" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
